name: Barry & The Zombies
description:
The game

Barry & The Zombies is a difficult roguelike top-down shooter. Can you defeat all the bosses? Get ready to die.

Authors

Programming: Franciszek Luczak & Jakub Szulwinski
Graphics: Franciszek Luczak
Music:
WVC
KAX
Phil Elementz
Sound Design: Franciszek Luczak
